activities:
Demandware provides its customers with a hosted Commerce platform and application suite of services that facilitate functionality to support the development and management of Commerce websites. Demandware serves as a data processor for Demandware’s customers who use these services. More specifically, Demandware does not own the information that is submitted to customer websites. The information that is submitted to our customers’ websites will be subject to Demandware’s customers’ privacy policy and Demandware does not choose or determine the type of data that is collected by our customers through our services.  Any access to, or use of, such data is incidental to completing Demandware’s contractual obligations to its customers as a data processor.  
As part of its own internal operations that are unrelated to its service offering, Demandware also collects, transfers and uses data from our European-based operations, employees, partners, agents and consultants in respect of employment activities, sales and activity and leads, customer service delivery and relationship management, general business activities and compliance activities.  
Demandware also collects and processes personal information through its web sites for general marketing and employment recruitment activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, human resources, customer, prospect, partner and supplier data, services data
privacyprograms: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Privacy Program
recoursemech: TRUSTe dispute resolution for non-human resources data.  EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for human resources data only.
